author: prickett
msg: Moved the build property files that were orignally in
jakarta-commons-sandbox/periodicity/conf/torque to
jakarta-commons-sandbox/periodicity/conf/build
Fixed the build file to reflect this change
Added a war task that does not depend on building the jar and javadocs, this
task assumes that they are already up to date. It is convenient for building
the web archive when only configuration data has changed.
Added a war task that builds the jar file but does not build the javadoc. It
is useful for when you just want to test a new build with your servlet engine.
It assumes that the javadocs are already created.
Turrned off the XSLT and XMLRPC services because they were not needed yet and
they were causing exceptions to be logged in the turbine.log file at startup.

author: prickett
msg: Moved event_detail.vtl to event_detail.vm

author: prickett
msg: Added turbine jar to the build classpath
Added default velocity templates from the TDK to the web archive
Fixed url pattern matching bug in the web.xml configuration file
Added turbine.jar property to the build.jars.properties file
Added a default template service to the TurbineResources configuration file
Added org.apache.commons.periodicity.turbine to the turbine module path
in the TurbineResources configuration file

author: prickett
msg: A first cut of the turbine configuration file.

author: prickett
msg: A first cut of a web.xml file to include in the war file.
